description: Essential greetings, polite expressions, and social courtesies for daily interactions

phrases.english: Good morning! How are you today?
phrases.exampleSentence: Labas rytas! Kaip jūs šiandien? Tikuosi, gerai miegojote.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Good morning! How are you today? I hope you slept well.

phrases.english: Excuse me, could you help me?
phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašau, ar galėtumėte man padėti rasti autobusų stotį?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Excuse me, could you help me find the bus station?

phrases.english: Thank you very much for your patience
phrases.exampleSentence: Labai ačiū už jūsų kantrybę, aš tik mokausi kalbos.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Thank you very much for your patience, I'm just learning the language.

phrases.english: I'm very sorry I'm late
phrases.exampleSentence: Man labai gaila, kad vėluoju. Automobilyje buvo spūstis.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I'm very sorry I'm late. There was traffic.

phrases.lithuanian: Ar galiu jums kuo nors padėti?
phrases.english: Can I help you with anything?
phrases.exampleSentence: Ar galiu jums kuo nors padėti? Matau, kad ieškote kažko.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Can I help you with anything? I see you're looking for something.

phrases.english: Nice to meet you
phrases.exampleSentence: Malonu su jumis susipažinti! Esu Jonas iš Vilniaus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Nice to meet you! I'm Jonas from Vilnius.

phrases.english: Good night!
phrases.exampleSentence: Su labu naktimi! Iki rytojaus pasimatymo.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Good night! See you tomorrow.

phrases.english: Thank you for the warm welcome
phrases.exampleSentence: Dėkoju už šiltą priėmimą! Jūs labai malonūs žmonės.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Thank you for the warm welcome! You are very nice people.

phrases.english: Sorry for the inconvenience
phrases.exampleSentence: Atleiskite už nepatogumą. Stengsimės tai ištaisyti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Sorry for the inconvenience. We'll try to fix this.

phrases.english: Have a nice day
phrases.exampleSentence: Linkiu gražios dienos! Tikiuosi, kad viskas seksis.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Have a nice day! I hope everything goes well.

phrases.english: Long time no see!
phrases.exampleSentence: O, labas, Ieva! Seniai nesimatėme! Kaip tau sekasi pastaruoju metu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Oh, hello, Ieva! Long time no see! How have you been lately?

phrases.english: How are things developing for you? (general 'how are you' update)
phrases.exampleSentence: Labas, Jonai! Kaip tau viskas klostosi su nauju projektu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Hello, Jonas! How are things developing for you with the new project?

phrases.english: Nothing new / Everything is as before.
phrases.exampleSentence: Kaip gyveni? – Nieko naujo, o tu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: How are you living? – Nothing new, and you? (informal)

phrases.english: Good luck to you / Have a good day!
phrases.exampleSentence: Džiaugiuosi už tave! Sėkmės tau rytoj!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I am happy for you! Good luck to you tomorrow!

phrases.lithuanian: Viso labo! (Used for a slightly more final or drawn-out goodbye)
phrases.english: Farewell! / All the best!
phrases.exampleSentence: Man jau metas eiti. Viso labo ir dėkui už pokalbį.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: It's time for me to go now. Farewell and thanks for the conversation.

phrases.english: I hope you have a good time (will spend time well).
phrases.exampleSentence: Gera kelionė! Tikiuosi, kad gerai praleisi laiką Šventojoje.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Have a good trip! I hope you have a good time in Šventoji.

phrases.english: I apologize deeply (or: I am very sorry for the delay).
phrases.exampleSentence: Aš labai atsiprašau už vėlavimą, kamščiai buvo dideli.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I apologize deeply for the delay, the traffic jams were big.

phrases.english: I would like to apologize. (More formal and softer than a direct apology)
phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašyti norėčiau dėl nesusipratimo vakar.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I would like to apologize for the misunderstanding yesterday.

phrases.english: I sincerely thank you for your help. (Formal, warm gratitude)
phrases.exampleSentence: Nuoširdžiai dėkoju už Jūsų pagalbą; be jos nebūčiau susitvarkęs.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I sincerely thank you for your help; I wouldn't have managed without it.

phrases.english: How might I be able to help you? (Conditional, polite offer)
phrases.exampleSentence: Matau, kad ieškote kažko. Kuo galėčiau Jums padėti?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I see you are looking for something. How might I be able to help you?
